properties.entry: INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID , WISH_NUM , WISH_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , ? , WISH_NUM.NEXTVAL , DEFAULT )

SELECT NOTICE_TITLE , C_PRICE , C_CATEGORY , C_SDATE , C_EDATE , C_LOCATION , C_TIME1 , C_TIME2 , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME FROM WISHLIST W JOIN NOTICE USING (NOTICE_NUM) JOIN CLASS USING (NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING (NOTICE_NUM) WHERE WISH_STATUS = 'N' AND NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND FILE_LEVEL = '0' AND W.USER_ID = ? ORDER BY W.WISH_NUM DESC
